subject: Re: [junit] Request features
msgSnippet: ... exception. Hmm, I wouldn t then be able to verify the return code, correct? I think I d prefer the stub, in either case. Good thought, though. Jeff
messageBody:
CÃ©dric Beust ? wrote:
> > Which is something I had to deal with two days ago, while writing tests

exception.

Hmm, I wouldn't then be able to verify the return code, correct? I think
I'd prefer the stub, in either case. Good thought, though.

Jeff
